name: AUDIT_DETAILS
documentation: The set of attributes required to document the committal of an information item to a repository.

system_id.name: system_id
system_id.documentation: Identifier of the logical EHR system where the change was committed. This is almost always owned by the organisation legally responsible for the EHR, and is distinct from any application, or any hosting infrastructure.

time_committed.name: time_committed
time_committed.documentation: Time of committal of the item.

change_type.name: change_type
change_type.documentation: Type of change. Coded using the openEHR Terminology  audit change type  group.

description.name: description
description.documentation: Reason for committal. This may be used to qualify the value in the `_change_type_` field. For example, if the change affects only the EHR directory, this field might be used to indicate 'Folder "episode 2018-02-16" added' or similar.

committer.name: committer
committer.documentation: Identity and optional reference into identity management service, of user who committed the item.
